Instance.description: Represents a state linked to a commodity. Changes in the commodity will change the object's state, and changes directly to the state of the object will update the commodity to an appropriate value.

Tunable.name: linked_stat
Tunable.description: The statistic to link to the state.

Tunable.name: lot_based
Tunable.description: Whether the state should check the linked stat on the active lot instead of on the object itself.
